message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you a decent amount to start, but don't get too comfortable!
You're being generous, but I'm not settling for that little. I want more!
I'm not sure I'm comfortable giving up that much, Bob. Let's see what you've got for Round 3!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I need to get a bigger share before the money disappears!
I'm starting to think you're not serious about getting a good deal. Let's meet in the middle!
Alright, Bob, I'll meet you in the middle. Let's end this and get what we can!
